name: Heist 2012
description:
It's 2012 and the entire world lives on credit.The money left has been accumulated in huge banks, the largest of which is the L.D. International United Bank in Switzerland.
You take the role of a poor computer systems engineer who is on mission to take as much of that money as possible for himself. He needs to find keys to safes dotted around, each safe opened will yield a letter in the password that gives access to the bank's main computer. Once the password is recovered ,the computer room has to be found and the password entered.
Heist 2012 is heavily influenced by Jet Set Willy where pixel perfect platforming is the order of the day. Energy is represented by a muscled arm holding a dumbbell, if you lose energy by touching one of the guards the arm will gradually go lower until you lose of the six lives.
